name: @lanonasis/security-service
description: Enterprise-grade security service for secrets, API keys, and access control

scripts.test:packages: npm --prefix oauth-client install --ignore-scripts --no-package-lock && npm --prefix security-sdk install --ignore-scripts --no-package-lock && npm --prefix web install --ignore-scripts --no-package-lock && npm --prefix vortex-secure/packages/vortex-mcp-sdk install --ignore-scripts --no-package-lock && npm --prefix oauth-client run test && npm --prefix security-sdk run test && npm --prefix web run test && npm --prefix vortex-secure/packages/vortex-mcp-sdk run test

author: Seye Derick
